scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=frontend && npm run format --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=frontend && npm run test:coverage --workspace=backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=shared
